quests.desc: I hope you're ready to go into rooms and interact with objects, because you've just entered TextWorld! Your first objective is to head south. And then, open the gateway. After that, make an attempt to travel west. And then, move south. And then, make an attempt to head west. Then, travel north. After that, make an effort to move west. And then, pick up the iron from the floor of the laundromat. Then, try to venture east. After that, place the iron on the floor of the shower. That's it!

infos.name: shower
infos.desc:
You are in a shower. A standard one.

 You can see a safe.[if c_0 is open and there is something in the c_0] The safe contains [a list of things in the c_0]![end if][if c_0 is open and the c_0 contains nothing] Empty! What kind of nightmare TextWorld is this?[end if]

 There is [if d_2 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] door leading east. You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unblocked. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going west.

infos.name: laundromat
infos.desc:
Okay, so you're in a laundromat, cool, but is it ordinary? You better believe it is.

 You hear a noise behind you and spin around, but you can't see anything other than a counter. The counter is ordinary.[if there is something on the s_0] On the counter you see [a list of things on the s_0].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_0] But there isn't a thing on it.[end if] You make out a bench. The bench is ordinary.[if there is something on the s_1] On the bench you can make out [a list of things on the s_1].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_1] But the thing hasn't got anything on it.[end if]

There is an unguarded exit to the east.

infos.name: chamber
infos.desc:
You find yourself in a chamber. An ordinary one.

 You make out a bed. The bed is ordinary.[if there is something on the s_2] On the bed you can see [a list of things on the s_2].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_2] However, the bed, like an empty bed, has nothing on it. It would have been so cool if there was stuff on the bed.[end if]

There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unguarded. You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unblocked. You don't like doors? Why not try going west, that entranceway is unguarded.

infos.name: bedroom
infos.desc:
You have come into the most normal of all possible bedrooms.

 Hey, want to see a locker? Look over there, a locker.[if c_1 is open and there is something in the c_1] The locker contains [a list of things in the c_1].[end if][if c_1 is open and the c_1 contains nothing] What a letdown! The locker is empty![end if] As if things weren't amazing enough already, you can even see a non-euclidean locker.[if c_2 is open and there is something in the c_2] The non-euclidean locker contains [a list of things in the c_2].[end if][if c_2 is open and the c_2 contains nothing] What a letdown! The non-euclidean locker is empty![end if]

You don't like doors? Why not try going east, that entranceway is unguarded. There is an unguarded exit to the north.

infos.name: canteen
infos.desc:
You are in a canteen. An ordinary kind of place. You can barely contain your excitement.



There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unblocked. There is an exit to the west. Don't worry, it is unblocked.

infos.name: bedchamber
infos.desc:
Ah, the bedchamber. This is some kind of bedchamber, really great ordinary vibes in this place, a wonderful ordinary atmosphere.



 There is [if d_1 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] gateway leading east. There is [if d_0 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] portal leading north. There is [if d_2 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] door leading west. You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unguarded.

infos.name: vault
infos.desc:
You arrive in a vault. An ordinary one.



 There is [if d_1 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] gateway leading west. There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unblocked. There is an unguarded exit to the south.

infos.name: workshop
infos.desc:
Well how about that, you are in a place we're calling a workshop. You begin to take stock of what's here.



 There is [if d_0 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] portal leading south. You don't like doors? Why not try going west, that entranceway is unblocked.

infos.name: salon
infos.desc:
This salon you have just entered is definitely standard.

 Look out! It's a- oh, never mind, it's just a recliner. [if there is something on the s_3]You see [a list of things on the s_3] on the recliner.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_3]But the thing is empty, unfortunately.[end if] You can see a desk. [if there is something on the s_4]On the desk you make out [a list of things on the s_4].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_4]The desk appears to be empty.[end if]

You don't like doors? Why not try going east, that entranceway is unblocked.

infos.name: cellar
infos.desc:
This might come as a shock to you, but you've just fallen into a cellar.



There is an unblocked exit to the south.

infos.name: door
infos.desc: it is what it is, a door [if open]You can see inside it.[else if closed]You can't see inside it because the lid's in your way.[otherwise]There is a lock on it.[end if]

infos.name: portal
infos.desc: The portal looks noble. [if open]It is open.[else if closed]It is closed.[otherwise]It is locked.[end if]

infos.name: gateway
infos.desc: The gateway looks stuffy. [if open]It is open.[else if closed]It is closed.[otherwise]It is locked.[end if]

infos.name: safe
infos.desc: The safe looks strong, and impossible to break. [if open]You can see inside it.[else if closed]You can't see inside it because the lid's in your way.[otherwise]There is a lock on it.[end if]

infos.name: locker
infos.desc: The locker looks strong, and impossible to destroy. [if open]It is open.[else if closed]It is closed.[otherwise]It is locked.[end if]

infos.name: non-euclidean locker
infos.desc: The non-euclidean locker looks strong, and impossible to destroy. [if open]You can see inside it.[else if closed]You can't see inside it because the lid's in your way.[otherwise]There is a lock on it.[end if]

infos.name: coconut
infos.desc: that's a standard coconut!

infos.name: huckleberry
infos.desc: The huckleberry looks savory.

infos.name: stick of butter
infos.desc: You couldn't pay me to eat that normal thing.

infos.name: latchkey
infos.desc: The latchkey is heavier than it looks.

infos.name: iron
infos.desc: The iron is unremarkable.

infos.name: mug
infos.desc: The mug seems out of place here

infos.name: counter
infos.desc: The counter is durable.

infos.name: bench
infos.desc: The bench is an unstable piece of garbage.

infos.name: bed
infos.desc: The bed is durable.

infos.name: recliner
infos.desc: The recliner is undependable.

infos.name: desk
infos.desc: The desk is an unstable piece of trash.

infos.name: legume
infos.desc: that's an usual legume!

infos.name: gummy bear
infos.desc: The gummy bear looks appetizing.

infos.name: non-euclidean key
infos.desc: The non-euclidean key is weighty.

infos.name: cushion
infos.desc: The cushion appears to fit in here

infos.name: plant
infos.desc: The plant is well-used.

infos.name: controller
infos.desc: The controller seems out of place here

objective: Hey, thanks for coming over to the TextWorld today, there is something I need you to do for me. First off, take a trip south. After that, open the gateway within the vault. After pulling open the gateway, take a trip west. With that accomplished, move south. And then, make an attempt to go west. Then, venture north. Then, travel west. Following that, lift the iron from the floor of the laundromat. And then, move east. And then, toss the iron on the floor of the shower. Alright, thanks!
